title: Help we watch op.gg replays
body: So recently I tried to watch kr replays and it wouldnt let me and it would just say "lol directory not found" so I tried to fix it and now I cant watch na or kr replays I used to be able to watch na replays before. Can someone please help we watch both na and kr replays. The first one to help me fix this issue I will give $5 worth of rp. ty

replies.body: Pretty sure those replays on op.gg still use the League game files, and if you weren't using the KR client that would be why you couldn't watch KR replays. It kind of sounds like you might have altered some of the client game files, at which point you likely just need to run a quick repair to get this fixed up.
